CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: XIAO-I Corp is a global AI industrialization company focusing on AI Cognitive Intelligence platform. The platform combines six core technologies including Natural Language Processing, Speech Processing, Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Affective Computing, Data Intelligence and Hyper- automation. Based on the platform, The company√Ç developed products and solutions in fields of Al+ Contact Center, Al+ Finance, Al+ City Public Service, Al+ Architecture, Al+ Metaverse, Al+ Manufacturing, and Al+ Healthcare. It generates revenue from the sale of software products and service, M&S service, and sale of cloud platform products.
